description: This file contains a base class for self-testing buildhistory features in the OEQA framework. It provides methods to configure, run, and validate buildhistory operations during tests.

classes.name: BuildhistoryBase
classes.description: A base class providing setup and execution methods for buildhistory related self-tests.

methods.name: config_buildhistory(self, tmp_bh_location=False)
methods.description: Configures buildhistory in the environment, optionally setting a temporary directory for testing.

methods.name: run_buildhistory_operation(self, target, global_config='', target_config='', change_bh_location=False, expect_error=False, error_regex='')
methods.description: Runs a buildhistory operation with given targets and configurations, checks for expected success or failure.

ctags.name: run_buildhistory_operation
ctags.pattern: /^    def run_buildhistory_operation(self, target, global_config='', target_config='', change_bh_l/
ctags.signature: (self, target, global_config='', target_config='', change_bh_location=False, expect_error=False, error_regex='')
